meanings.sent1: The miniaturized toy car fit perfectly in the palm of his hand.
meanings.sent2: The miniaturized model of the Eiffel Tower was incredibly detailed.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturized furniture for dolls looked like it belonged in a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Her miniaturized collection of figurines transformed her room into a tiny wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturized world inside the snow globe was enchanting.

meanings.sent1: The miniaturized smartphone was easy to carry around.
meanings.sent2: The miniaturized version of the painting lost some of its original details.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturized cupcakes were so tiny, they seemed like they were made for ants.
meanings.sent4: His miniaturized collection of books took up very little space on the shelf.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturized elephant figurine was adorable in its small size.
